dataLink.name: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)

availability.description: A new set of global gridded land-use forcing datasets are being developed to link historical land-use data and future projections in a standard format required by climate models.
availability.name: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)

description: Apply all transient historical forcings that are relevant for the land surface model except for irrigation and fertilisation.
name: Historical land surface forcings except irrigation and fertilisation
rationale: Investigate the impact of a specific land management features across models with different sets of full land management.
longName: historical land surface  forcings except irrigation and fertilisation
keywords: LUMIP, historical, land surface forcing, no irrigation, no fertilisation
